#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
void print(int arr[] , int l)
{
	int i;
	for(i=0; i<l-1; i++)
	{
		printf("%d " , arr[i]);

	}
	printf("%d\n" , arr[i]);
}
char arr[4000001];
int starts[4000001];
int point[4000001];
int main()
{
	while(1)
	{
		
		scanf("%s" , arr);
		if(arr[0]=='E')
			return 0;
		int len = strlen(arr);
		
		int n=0, i;
		point[0]=0;
		for(i=1; i<len; i++)
		{
			if(arr[i]==arr[0])
			{
				starts[n]=i;
				n++;
				point[i]=n-1;
				//printf("%d ", point[i]);
			}
			else
			{
				point[i]=n;
				//printf("%d ", point[i]);
			}
		}
		starts[n]=9999999;
		//print(point , len);
		//print(starts, n);
		
		int cur = 0;
		//int crap;
		for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
		{
			//scanf("%d" , &crap);
			if(i==0)
				printf("0");
			else
			{
				if(arr[cur]==arr[i])
				{
					cur++;
				}
				else
				{
					int k=0;
					int t =point[i-cur-1];
					//printf("\nhell %d %d\n" , i , cur);
					while(starts[t+k]<=i)
					{
						//printf("\nDebug %d\n" , starts[t+k]);
						int j;
						for(j = starts[t+k] ; j<=i; j++)
							if(arr[j] != arr[j-starts[t+k]])
							break;
						if(j==i+1)
						{
							//printf("Here\n");
							cur = i - starts[t+k]+1;

							break;
						}
						k++;
					}
					if(starts[t+k]>i)
						cur=0;
					
				}
				
				printf(" %d" , cur);
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
		
	}
}
